Name: Search for American Equity Product and Verify Home Page
Description: Navigate to the homepage, search for a product, click on the American Equity link, check the price tab, and verify the homepage.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to *
Step 2: Click on searchButton
Step 3: Enter input value in searchInputField
Step 4: Click on americanEquityLink -> Navigate to page 'product page#*/products/*/*'
Step 5: Click on priceTab -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Retirement Calculator Input and Plan Review
Description: Navigate to the retirement calculator, enter financial information multiple times, view plan results, and verify the homepage.

Step 1: Navigate to */retirementcalculator
Step 2: Enter financial information multiple times and view plan
	- Step 1: Click on input userFinancialInfo (userAge)
	- Step 2: Enter input value in input userFinancialInfo (userAge)
	- Step 3: Click on input userFinancialInfo (userAnnualIncome)
	- Step 4: Enter input value in input userFinancialInfo (userAnnualIncome)
	- Step 5: Click on input userFinancialInfo (userRetirementSavings)
	- Step 6: Enter input value in input userFinancialInfo (userRetirementSavings)

	- Step 8: Click on input userFinancialInfo (userMonthlySavings)
	- Step 9: Enter input value in input userFinancialInfo (userMonthlySavings)

	- Step 1: Click on link navigation (next2)
	- Step 2: Click on input userFinancialInfo (userIncomeOther)
	- Step 3: Click on input userFinancialInfo (userIncomeOther)
	- Step 4: Enter input value in input userFinancialInfo (userIncomeOther)
	- Step 5: Click on link navigation (next)

Step 5: Click on link navigation (next)
Step 6: Click on div userInputs (UserRequiredIncome)
Step 7: Click on link navigation (seeMyResults)
Step 8: Click on resultsViewSelect
Step 9: Click on projectedIncomeTab
Step 10: Click on startOverButton -> Navigate to page ''
